column3: hook i'm black and jewish don't be so foolish i'm black and jewish it's a mitzvah  please don't forget i'm black please don't forget i'm jewish i play ball like lebron and i know what a w is chilling in boca raton with my mensch lenny kravitz the only purple drink we sip is purple manischewitz at my show you won't simply put your hands in the air we can also raise a chair or recite a jewish prayer like baruch yitadel yisrael ve'et ha kim kardashian kanye west amen i eat hova with nova knishes with my bitches a bagel and cream cheesy with my boy his name is weezy do not go to feingold's though the pickles are rubber and i will not be harming ya i read the old testament okra and matzahball i'll eat the rest of it i celebrate hanukkah dated rihannakah birth right in israel mama from canada daddy from africa best of worlds when you're jewish with black in ya challah
